snippet: The nurse, who was admitted to an infectious disease hospital in Rome, returned home last week after working in Sierra Leone.
abstract: Italian nurse who had been working with aid group Emergency in Sierra Leone tests positive for Ebola virus upon his return to Italy and is hospitalized in an infectious diseases hospital in Rome.
lead_paragraph: The nurse, who was admitted to an infectious disease hospital in Rome, returned home last week after working in Sierra Leone.

headline.main: Italian Nurse Who Worked in Sierra Leone Tests Positive for Ebola
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Italy: A Nurse Tests Positive for Ebola
